name: Snuggle Town
description:
You are a traveler of worlds, and you just arrived in Snuggle Town. It turns out you arrived at the most opportune moment. The town lost all of its Snuggle Friends and they need your help recovering them! Explore the colorfully vibrant town in search of all the snuggle friends and restore peace to Snuggle World.

Made with the Smile Game Builder engine, this is a short and simple introductory game to turn-based RPGs. It's your child's first video game! It's also my first game I ever made, too though...  :)
